DataElement.preferredName: MRI Receive Coil Manufacturer Name 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Name of manufacturer of receive coil. Required if Frame Type (0008,9007) Value 1 of this frame is ORIGINAL. May be present otherwise.  [Standard_based]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Receive Coil Manufacturer Name
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The name of a business engaged in manufacturing the coil of the NMR signal RF receiver.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide amazingly clear and detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders.

Concepts.definition: Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders.

Property.preferredDefinition: Received; taken, gotten, or acquired.:A structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops.:Manufacturer Name; the name of a business engaged in manufacturing some product:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.
A structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops.
A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
